security: Revealing details of security agreements, project codes (MATADOR, AZORIAN), and internal security procedures could compromise ongoing or future operations. The document also lists personal information such as addresses, employment history, and family details. Quoting directly: "SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS: COVERT CASE: NO GOVT. INTEREST TO BE SHOWN."
summary: A file review documents security agreements and background information for Claude Barives Capelart, including his employment at Global Marine, involvement in projects MATADOR and AZORIAN, and various personal details spanning from 1963 to 1975.
summary_one_paragraph: This file review, dated between 1963 and 1975, pertains to Claude Barives Capelart and includes details regarding his security agreements, employment at Global Marine (Los Angeles), and involvement in projects MATADOR and AZORIAN. It also contains memos about record destruction and special instructions for a covert case where no government interest is to be shown.
title: File Review: Claude Barives Capelart
